body_html:
Thanks, @joseortiz3. Trying to follow through your solution now. I have a little different configuration so I hope this would also work for me. I will get back here and update the issue after I completed my process.

~$ python --version
Python 3.6.5 :: Anaconda, Inc.
~$ nvcc --version
nvcc: NVIDIA (R) Cuda compiler driver
Copyright (c) 2005-2017 NVIDIA Corporation
Built on Fri_Nov__3_21:07:56_CDT_2017
Cuda compilation tools, release 9.1, V9.1.85
~$ cat /usr/local/cuda/version.txt
CUDA Version 10.0.130
